ARABIC: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِذَا لَقِيتُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ زَحْفًا فَلَا تُوَلُّوهُمُ ٱلْأَدْبَارَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You who have iman! when you encounter those who are kafir advancing in massed ranks into battle, do not turn your backs on them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: O believers, when you meet unbelievers on the field of battle, do not turn your backs to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Believers, whenever you encounter a hostile force of unbelievers, do not turn your backs to them in flight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Believers, do not retreat when facing the marching army of the unbelievers, for no believer will turn back at that time except for strategic reasons or to join another band.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: O People who Believe! When you confront a large army of disbelievers in battle, do not turn your backs to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: O you who believe! When you meet those who disbelieve, in a battlefield, never turn your backs to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: O you who believe! when you meet those who disbelieve marching for war, then turn not your backs to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: O believers, when you encounter the unbelievers marching to battle, turn not your backs to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: O ye who believe! When ye meet those who disbelieve in battle, turn not your backs to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Believers, when you meet in battle those who deny the truth, never turn your backs on them:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: O Ye who believe! whenever ye those who disbelieve matching meet slowly turn to them not your backs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: O you who have faith! When you encounter the faithless advancing [for battle], do not turn your backs [to flee] from them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: O ye who believe! when ye meet the Unbelievers in hostile array, never turn your backs to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: O you who believe! When you meet those who disbelieve, in a battle-field, never turn your backs to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Believers, when you encounter unbelievers on the march do not turn your backs to them in flight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: O you who believe! When you meet those who disbelieve on the march, never turn your backs on them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: O you who have believed, when you meet those who disbelieve advancing [for battle], do not turn to them your backs [in flight].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [8:15] O you who believe, when you encounter the disbelievers inching forward, that is, amassed, advancing slowly because of their large numbers, do not turn your backs to them, fleeing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (0 ye who believe, When ye meet those who disbelieve) at Badr (in battle, turn not your backs to them) in defeat.
